sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>sun</radical> is <radical>correct</radical>, <kanji>absolutely</kanji>. The mighty sun is never wrong. It is absolutely correct, always.
meaningInfo: Imagine the sun in the sky. Its rays blind you as it corrects all of the errors you’ve made.
readingMnemonic: Then, a <reading>ze</reading>ppelin (<ja>ぜ</ja>) flies in front of the sun, blocking it out. <kanji>Absolutely</kanji>, the sun cannot ignore this transgression. Therefore, the sun corrects the zeppelin’s evil ways by frying it with sunshine and bringing it to the ground.
readingInfo: Imagine the sun being so absolutely consumed with rage that it catches a zeppelin on fire and crashes it. Feel the heat from the grounded zeppelin as it smolders.
